Series.Actors: |Eric Judor|Jean-Baptiste Shelmerdine|Arnaud Henriet|Lilly-Fleur Pointeaux|Toinette Laquière|Romain Berger|Assumpta Hafid Ferdjioui Benamar|
Series.Overview: After a year of coma, and while his comedy partner Ramzy is enjoying a success in ' HP' , a follow up of their smash hit ' H' , Eric, slightly frustrated has a revelation : he will make a serious movie. Despite the global skepticism, he decides to write the new "La Môme" : "La Môme 2.0 Next Generation".
